trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expone los tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> a la automatización de la interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: El elemento asociado a este nivel de automatización.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de elementos secundarios del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Elementos secundarios de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> que se asocia a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumeración de valor que especifica el patrón de control.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el patrón de control de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> que está asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si <paramref name="patternInterface" /> tiene el valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" />, este método devuelve un objeto que admite el patrón de control; de lo contrario, es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is read-only
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> es de solo lectura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is not enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> asociado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> no está habilitado; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Establece el foco de entrada de teclado en el elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> did not get focus.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> no obtuvo el foco.

trans-unit.source: The value to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property to.
trans-unit.target: Valor en el que establecer la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> que se asocia a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> en el valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> no está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> asociado con este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> asociado con este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
